org.javalite.activeweb.controller_filters

Class HttpSupportFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javalite.activeweb.HttpSupport
      • org.javalite.activeweb.controller_filters.HttpSupportFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLoggingFilter, TimingFilter

    public class HttpSupportFilter
extends HttpSupport
implements ControllerFilter
    This class is to be overridden by those filters that are to produce/override responses generated by controller. One use case is to catch all exceptions and respond with a canned error (page), another is an authentication controller that will redirect to a login page if user not logged in.
    Author:
    Igor Polevoy
